prop.caption: match
prop.description: an xpath statement which selects the nodes which will be rendered.

prop.caption: sort
prop.description: an xpath statement which selects the value which is subject to the sorting algorithm.

prop.caption: data-type
date-format
prop.description: the format of the date on which is sorted.

prop.caption: sort-method
prop.description: the name of a javascript function to executed to determine the value to sort on.

prop.caption: order
prop.description: the order of the sorted list.

prop.caption: case-order
prop.description: whether upper case characters have preference above lower case characters.
